comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Cornelius Vanderbilt III (September 5, 1873 – March 1, 1942) was a distinguished American military officer, inventor, engineer, and yachtsman, and a member of the prominent American Vanderbilt family." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cornelius_Vanderbilt_III

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Cornelius Vanderbilt was a member of the New Yoirk National Guard for over thirty years, This photo (or an almost identical one) was used in NYT of Sept 26, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10714F73B581273... under the headline of "Scenes at National Guard Civil War spectacular in Van Cortlandt Park.
